name: Rktcr
summary:
Rktcr is tool-assisted-speed-run: the game.
It both requires and enables you to play perfectly.
It is a very difficult game.

name: RKN - Roskomnadzor banned the Internet
summary: RKN - Roskomnadzor Banned Internet - The game where you will have the opportunity to feel yourself in the role of Roskomnadzor armed with a cannon, shooting bans!

name: RKR: Rush Kill Repeat
summary: With your head, name and purpose taken from you, the only thing that keeps you going is your unquenchable rage... and quickly draining blood. Reclaim what is yours before your blood runs dry.

name: RKN Block Me: Telegram
summary: Stubborn and arrogant RKN-chan declared Telegram outlawed and began blocking the whole Internet in her attempt to catch it! You’ll have to punish her and stop this madness. And you can do it by only one way - find out how!

name: RKGK
summary: Turn heads. Drop jaws. Be bright. In this single-player 3D platformer, you’re the only one who can take down Mr. Buff and his lackies to restore color and life to the citizens of Cap City. Accompany Valah and the RKGK crew on their journey to take down the oppressive B Corp.
